title: ISic003433. Epitaph for Belleia Vesonia
body:
1 ❦ D(is) · M(anibus) · ❦
2 Belleia · Vesonia · vix(it) ·
3 ann(is) · XXXIIII´ · L(ucius) · Ostrius ·
4 Crescens · uxori · rarissimae ·

l.2 reg., orig. BELLEIABelleia

1❦DM❦
2BELLEIAVESONIAVIX
3ANNXXXIIIILOSTRIUS
4CRESCENSUXORIRARISSIMAE

l.2 reg., orig. BELLEIABelleia

Facsimile Images

Apparatus criticus

  • Text based upon Bitto 2001 and controlled against photograph

English translation

Michael Economou

To the shades of the underworld. Belleia Vesonia lived for 34 years. Lucius Ostrius Crescens for his extraordinary wife.

commentary

bibliography

  • 1 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10000029
  • Orsi 1916 133 fig.8 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10001701
